Add CC Search to browser
See the XML file

README

There are a few files in here.
  • browsertest.html just tests the onclick and contains the addCCSearch() function
  • ccsearch.xml is the actual OpenSearch data following the OpenSearch spec and is pointed to by the js function
  • img/ contains the two images described in the xml document
NOTES:
  • The HTML file contains a link element for search auto-discovery
  • The javascript is based off of this code: http://mycroft.mozdev.org/default.js but has been de-generalized. It could use some double-checking.
  • All URLs are temporarily set to my a7 public_html/ and need to be rebased
